mapper.insert: insert into users_tb (id, pw, user_name, birth, address, detail_address, phone_number) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{userName}, #{birth}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT uid, id, pw, auth FROM users_tb WHERE id = #{id} AND delete_yn = 'n'
